attributes.action: Government shouldn't scrap promise to take in unaccompanied children from calais
attributes.background: According to Dubs Amendment of the refugee act, our government agreed to take in approx 3000 unaccompanied refugee children, Teressa May has silently scrapped this promise - we ask that she deliver what the government promised.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
